event: {"POST": {"student_file": [""], "student_answer": ["Things that I saw Cathy do that are important here are: 1. encourage students who are quick to respond with a thumbs up in the think time to try to see it a different way, too. Rather than just making them wait till everyone else was done, this gives them something to do and reinforces the many paths to one right answer idea. 2. Puts students at ease by using the words \"who is WILLING to share their way?\" instead of asking \"who knows the answer\". Addit
